Text copied and edited from the new edition: J.Cromwell, ZPE 184 (2013) 280â€“281. I have made two tacit corrections: l4-5: gi(nontai)=> gi(netai) (plural neutrum goes with a singular verb) l4: mo(non) => mo(na) (1 and 2/3 is already plural - as no(mismata))
